title: List of Dallas Cowboys seasons
text:
This article is a list of seasons of the <a href="Dallas%20Cowboys">Dallas Cowboys</a> <a href="American%20football">American football</a> <a href="Professional%20sports%20league%20organization">franchise</a> of the <a href="National%20Football%20League">National Football League</a> (NFL). The list documents the season-by-season records of the Cowboys' franchise from to present, including postseason records, and league awards for individual players or head coaches. The Cowboys franchise was founded in 1960 as an expansion team. The team has earned 33 postseason appearances, most in the NFL, the longest consecutive streak of winning seasons with twenty, the second-most appearances in the <a href="National%20Football%20Conference%20Championship%20Game">NFC Championship Game</a> (fourteen, behind the <a href="San%20Francisco%2049ers">San Francisco 49ers</a>' fifteen) and the second-most <a href="Super%20Bowl">Super Bowl</a> appearances (tied at eight with the <a href="Denver%20Broncos">Denver Broncos</a> and <a href="Steelers">Steelers</a>) behind the <a href="New%20England%20Patriots">New England Patriots</a> with eleven. The Cowboys have played for ten <a href="NFL%20Championship">NFL Championship</a>s and have won, all five being Super Bowls.
The Cowboys won <a href="Super%20Bowl%20VI">Super Bowls VI</a>, <a href="Super%20Bowl%20XII">XII</a>, <a href="Super%20Bowl%20XXVII">XXVII</a>, <a href="Super%20Bowl%20XXVIII">XXVIII</a> and <a href="Super%20Bowl%20XXX">XXX</a>. They also played in and lost <a href="Super%20Bowl%20V">Super Bowls V</a>, <a href="Super%20Bowl%20X">X</a>, and <a href="Super%20Bowl%20XIII">XIII</a>. Since winning Super Bowl XXX in the 1995 season, however, the Cowboys have eleven playoff appearances but only four playoff game victories and <a href="List%20of%20NFL%20franchise%20post-season%20droughts%23AFC/NFC%20Championship%20game%20appearance%20droughts">have not returned to the NFC Championship Game</a>.
